name: Cool It Off!
description:
Help! The reactor is about to have a Meltdown! We need 100 coolant in order to avoid the meltdown. Chests are nearby, we do not have a location on them. You will need to find the chests and deliver us the coolant, otherwise... things might be disastrous. 

Made for Weekly Game Jam, week 17, theme was Meltdown.

Currently I don't know how to get HTML builds from Godot into itch.io, but I'll try to figure it out shortly after uploading the windows/mac builds.

Find me on twitter: @g33kidd
Or on twitch, where I do weekly game development: twitch.tv/g33kidd
